text:
How do I bust CDN cache? I have a web page that is still showing the old design from over a week ago if I try from different regions and no matter what I try to do to the page, it still shows the older version.

It's just a simple page. Not using smart content or scheduling the page. I just publish after each change I am happy with. THe page does have a number of modules, but I haven't changed the majority of the in a while.

I am not sure what to try next.

Hey Parag, sorry to hear youâ€™re experiencing this issue. Contact HubSpot Support <http://help.HubSpot.com|help.HubSpot.com>. Tell them what you posted here but provide the URL and let them know what the change was that should be reflecting on the site.

It was great seeing you in-person just days ago. Hope you had an easy time getting back home. I know a lot of folks had delays.
It was good seeing you to <@U7SL518D6> !
